desc: Never highlight the text cursor
Enable active icon support
Disallow auto wraparound
Turn off cursor blinking
Enable the display of bold characters
Set the vt100 resource cutToBeginningOfLine to 'true'
Set the cjkWidth resource to 'false'
Enable recognition of ANSI color-change escape sequences
Cut newlines in line-mode selections
Don't workaround the bug in more(1)
Disable dynamic color changing
Don't ensure compatibility between normal and bold fonts bounding boxes
Normal and bold fonts have VT100 line-drawing characters
Don't generate HP Function Key escape codes for function keys
Close xterm's window after the shell exits
Don't use pseudo-terminal's sense of the stty erase value
Don't force insert mode
Don't use jump scrolling
Don't treat C1 control characters as printable
Turn off logging
Turn off support for encodings according the locale setting
The shell in xterm's window will not be login shell
Don't ring bell if the user types near the end of line
Allow write access to the terminal
Don't use builtin version for the wide-character calculation
Enable underlining
Disable PC style bold colors
Don't raise window on Control-G
Enable characters with reverse attribute as color
Disable reverse-wraparound
Turn off asynchronous scrolling
Send title/icon change requests always
Don't display scrollbar
Don't generate Sun Function Key escape codes for function keys
Move the screen to the bottom on input
Don't move the screen to the bottom on key press while scrolling
Don't setup session manager callbacks
Don't assume Sun/PC keyboard
VT102 mode
Don't display toolbar or menubar
Don't use UTF-8
Display characters with underline attribute as color
Write to the system utmp log file
Don't use visual bell instead of audio bell
Don't use wide characters
Don't wait the first time for the window to be mapped
